speaker: Carole Cadwalladr
title: Facebook's role in Brexit — and the threat to democracy
text:
{"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"time":1270,"text":"So, on the day after the Brexit vote,"},{"time":4198,"text":"in June 2016,"},{"time":7175,"text":"when Britain woke up to the shock"},{"time":9196,"text":"of discovering that we're leaving
the European Union,"},{"time":12149,"text":"my editor at the "Observer"
newspaper in the UK"},{"time":15006,"text":"asked me to go back to South Wales,
where I grew up, and to write a report."},{"time":20075,"text":"And so I went to a town called Ebbw Vale."}]},{"cues":[{"time":23178,"text":"Here it is."},{"time":24479,"text":"It's in the South Wales Valleys,
which is this quite special place."},{"time":28133,"text":"So it's had this very, sort of rich,
working-class culture,"},{"time":33046,"text":"and it's famous for its Welsh
male voice choirs and rugby and its coal."},{"time":38209,"text":"But when I was a teenager,
the coal mines and the steelworks closed,"},{"time":42677,"text":"and the entire area was devastated."},{"time":45780,"text":"And I went there because it had one of
the highest "Leave" votes in the country."},{"time":49774,"text":"Sixty-two percent of the people here
voted to leave the European Union."},{"time":54671,"text":"And I wanted to know why."}]},{"cues":[{"time":57624,"text":"When I got there,
I was just a bit taken aback,"},{"time":59870,"text":"because the last time I went to Ebbw Vale,"},{"time":62371,"text":"it looked like this."},{"time":64584,"text":"And now, it looks like this."},{"time":67521,"text":"This is a new 33-million-pound
college of further education"},{"time":72466,"text":"that was mostly funded
by the European Union."},{"time":76598,"text":"And this is the new sports center"},{"time":79693,"text":"that's at the middle of 350-million-pound
regeneration project"},{"time":84836,"text":"that's being funded by the European Union."},{"time":88805,"text":"And this is the new 77-million-pound
road-improvement scheme,"},{"time":92654,"text":"and there's a new train line,
a new railway station,"},{"time":95146,"text":"and they're all being funded
by the European Union."},{"time":97574,"text":"And it's not as if
any of this is a secret,"},{"time":99612,"text":"because there's big signs
like this everywhere."}]},{"cues":[{"time":101867,"text":"[EU Funds: Investing in Wales]"}]},{"cues":[{"time":103348,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":105542,"text":"I had this sort of
weird sense of unreality,"},{"time":107824,"text":"walking around the town."},{"time":109654,"text":"And it came to a head"},{"time":111070,"text":"when I met this young man
in front of the sports center."},{"time":115482,"text":"And he told me that he had voted to leave,"},{"time":119141,"text":"because the European Union
had done nothing for him."},{"time":125657,"text":"He was fed up with it."},{"time":127736,"text":"And all around town,
people told me the same thing."},{"time":131895,"text":"They said that they wanted
to take back control,"},{"time":134673,"text":"which was one of the slogans
in the campaign."},{"time":137665,"text":"And they told me
that they were most fed up"},{"time":139934,"text":"with the immigrants and with the refugees."},{"time":142244,"text":"They'd had enough."}]},{"cues":[{"time":144847,"text":"Which was odd."},{"time":146292,"text":"Because walking around,
I didn't meet any immigrants or refugees."},{"time":149616,"text":"I met one Polish woman who told me"},{"time":151316,"text":"she was practically
the only foreigner in town."},{"time":153561,"text":"And when I checked the figures,"},{"time":155227,"text":"I discovered that Ebbw Vale actually has"},{"time":157332,"text":"one of the lowest rates
of immigration in the country."},{"time":161395,"text":"And so I was just a bit baffled,"},{"time":162998,"text":"because I couldn't really understand"},{"time":164752,"text":"where people were getting
their information from."},{"time":167093,"text":"Because it was the right-wing
tabloid newspapers"},{"time":169371,"text":"which printed all these stories
about immigration."},{"time":171768,"text":"And this is a very much
left-wing Labour stronghold."}]},{"cues":[{"time":176006,"text":"But then after the article came out,
this woman got in touch with me."},{"time":179585,"text":"And she was from Ebbw Vale,"},{"time":181829,"text":"and she told me about all this stuff
that she'd seen on Facebook."},{"time":184916,"text":"I was like, "What stuff?""},{"time":186146,"text":"And she said it was all this quite scary
stuff about immigration,"},{"time":189276,"text":"and especially about Turkey."},{"time":190673,"text":"So I tried to find it."},{"time":192378,"text":"But there was nothing there."},{"time":194507,"text":"Because there's no archive
of ads that people had seen"},{"time":198404,"text":"or what had been pushed
into their news feeds."},{"time":202491,"text":"No trace of anything,
gone completely dark."},{"time":206956,"text":"And this referendum that will have
this profound effect forever on Britain --"},{"time":212845,"text":"it's already had a profound effect:"},{"time":215187,"text":"the Japanese car manufacturers
that came to Wales and the north east"},{"time":218427,"text":"to replace the mining jobs --"},{"time":219885,"text":"they are already going because of Brexit."}]},{"cues":[{"time":222316,"text":"And this entire referendum
took place in darkness,"},{"time":227244,"text":"because it took place on Facebook."},{"time":231974,"text":"And what happens on Facebook
stays on Facebook,"},{"time":236005,"text":"because only you see your news feed,
and then it vanishes,"},{"time":239196,"text":"so it's impossible to research anything."},{"time":241434,"text":"So we have no idea who saw what ads"},{"time":244212,"text":"or what impact they had,"},{"time":246482,"text":"or what data was used
to target these people."},{"time":249323,"text":"Or even who placed the ads,
or how much money was spent,"},{"time":252600,"text":"or even what nationality they were."}]},{"cues":[{"time":256617,"text":"But Facebook does."},{"time":259291,"text":"Facebook has these answers,"},{"time":261688,"text":"and it's refused to give them to us."},{"time":264911,"text":"Our parliament has asked Mark Zuckerberg
multiple times to come to Britain"},{"time":269601,"text":"and to give us these answers."},{"time":271442,"text":"And every single time, he's refused."},{"time":275244,"text":"And you have to wonder why."},{"time":278125,"text":"Because what I and other
journalists have uncovered"},{"time":281165,"text":"is that multiple crimes
took place during the referendum."},{"time":284831,"text":"And they took place on Facebook."}]},{"cues":[{"time":288966,"text":"It's because in Britain,
we limit the amount of money"},{"time":291498,"text":"that you can spend in an election."},{"time":293902,"text":"And it's because in the 19th century,"},{"time":295852,"text":"people would walk around
with literally wheelbarrows of cash"},{"time":299196,"text":"and just buy voters."},{"time":301617,"text":"So we passed these strict laws
to stop that from happening."},{"time":306257,"text":"But those laws don't work anymore."},{"time":308663,"text":"This referendum took place
almost entirely online."},{"time":312282,"text":"And you can spend any amount of money
on Facebook or on Google or on YouTube ads"},{"time":316891,"text":"and nobody will know,
because they're black boxes."},{"time":319617,"text":"And this is what happened."}]},{"cues":[{"time":322220,"text":"We've actually got no idea
of the full extent of it."},{"time":325046,"text":"But we do know that in the last days
before the Brexit vote,"},{"time":328191,"text":"the official "Vote Leave" campaign"},{"time":330588,"text":"laundered nearly three quarters
of a million pounds"},{"time":334691,"text":"through another campaign entity"},{"time":337792,"text":"that our electoral commission
has ruled was illegal,"},{"time":340871,"text":"and it's referred it to the police."}]},{"cues":[{"time":343315,"text":"And with this illegal cash,"},{"time":347737,"text":""Vote Leave" unleashed
a fire hose of disinformation."},{"time":353503,"text":"Ads like this."}]},{"cues":[{"time":354710,"text":"[Turkey's 76m people joining the EU]"}]},{"cues":[{"time":356495,"text":"This is a lie, it's a total lie."},{"time":358153,"text":"Turkey is not joining the European Union."},{"time":360559,"text":"There's not even any discussions
of it joining the European Union."},{"time":365793,"text":"And most of us, we never saw these ads,"},{"time":368254,"text":"because we were not the target of them."},{"time":370944,"text":""Vote Leave" identified
a tiny sliver of people"},{"time":374649,"text":"who it identified as persuadable,
and they saw them."},{"time":377522,"text":"And the only reason
we are seeing these now"},{"time":380006,"text":"is because parliament forced
Facebook to hand them over."}]},{"cues":[{"time":385587,"text":"And maybe you think,"},{"time":386785,"text":""Well, it was just a bit of overspending."},{"time":388770,"text":"It's a few lies.""},{"time":390611,"text":"But this was the biggest electoral fraud
in Britain for 100 years."},{"time":397405,"text":"In a once-in-a-generation vote"},{"time":400698,"text":"that hinged upon just
one percent of the electorate."},{"time":407075,"text":"And it was just one of the crimes
that took place in the referendum."}]},{"cues":[{"time":411027,"text":"There was another group,"},{"time":412594,"text":"which was headed
by this man, Nigel Farage,"},{"time":417522,"text":"the one to the right of Trump."},{"time":419760,"text":"And his group, "Leave.EU" --
it also broke the law."},{"time":423672,"text":"It broke British electoral laws
and British data laws,"},{"time":426966,"text":"and it's also being
referred to the police."},{"time":430879,"text":"And this man, Arron Banks,
he funded this campaign."},{"time":435696,"text":"And in a completely separate case,"},{"time":438458,"text":"he's being referred
to our National Crime Agency,"},{"time":442458,"text":"our equivalent of the FBI,"},{"time":444656,"text":"because our electoral commission"},{"time":446681,"text":"has concluded they don't know
where his money came from."},{"time":449743,"text":"Or if it was even British."},{"time":452712,"text":"And I'm not even going to go into
the lies that Arron Banks has told"},{"time":457706,"text":"about his covert relationship
with the Russian government."},{"time":462545,"text":"Or the weird timing of Nigel Farage's
meetings with Julian Assange"},{"time":466680,"text":"and with Trump's buddy,
Roger Stone, now indicted,"},{"time":469800,"text":"immediately before
two massive WikiLeaks dumps,"},{"time":473244,"text":"both of which happened
to benefit Donald Trump."},{"time":475974,"text":"But I will tell you that Brexit
and Trump were intimately entwined."},{"time":480773,"text":"This man told me that Brexit
was the petri dish for Trump."},{"time":486099,"text":"And we know it's the same people,
the same companies,"},{"time":488634,"text":"the same data, the same techniques,"},{"time":490340,"text":"the same use of hate and fear."}]},{"cues":[{"time":492188,"text":"This is what they
were posting on Facebook."},{"time":495538,"text":"And I don't even want to call this a lie,"}]},{"cues":[{"time":498221,"text":"[Immigration without assimilation
equals invasion]"}]},{"cues":[{"time":500627,"text":"because it feels more
like a hate crime to me."}]},{"cues":[{"time":506033,"text":"I don't have to tell you"},{"time":508072,"text":"that hate and fear are being sown online
all across the world."},{"time":514450,"text":"Not just in Britain and America,
but in France and in Hungary"},{"time":517586,"text":"and Brazil and Myanmar and New Zealand."},{"time":520751,"text":"And we know there is this dark undertow
which is connecting us all globally."},{"time":525973,"text":"And it is flowing
via the technology platforms."},{"time":530314,"text":"But we only see a tiny amount
of what's going on on the surface."}]},{"cues":[{"time":535244,"text":"And I only found out anything
about this dark underbelly"},{"time":540125,"text":"because I started looking into
Trump's relationship to Farage,"},{"time":543063,"text":"into a company called Cambridge Analytica."},{"time":546853,"text":"And I spent months tracking down
an ex-employee, Christopher Wiley."},{"time":551777,"text":"And he told me how this company,
that worked for both Trump and Brexit,"},{"time":556722,"text":"had profiled people politically"},{"time":559664,"text":"in order to understand
their individual fears,"},{"time":563815,"text":"to better target them with Facebook ads."},{"time":567870,"text":"And it did this by illicitly
harvesting the profiles"},{"time":572868,"text":"of 87 million people from Facebook."},{"time":578200,"text":"It took an entire year's work
to get Christopher on the record."},{"time":583243,"text":"And I had to turn myself 
from a feature writer"},{"time":585496,"text":"into an investigative reporter to do it."},{"time":588483,"text":"And he was extraordinarily brave,"},{"time":590102,"text":"because the company
is owned by Robert Mercer,"},{"time":593879,"text":"the billionaire who bankrolled Trump,"},{"time":595720,"text":"and he threatened
to sue us multiple times,"},{"time":598977,"text":"to stop us from publishing."}]},{"cues":[{"time":601077,"text":"But we finally got there,
and we were one day ahead of publication."},{"time":604831,"text":"We got another legal threat."},{"time":607329,"text":"Not from Cambridge Analytica this time,"},{"time":609227,"text":"but from Facebook."},{"time":612416,"text":"It told us that if we publish,
they would sue us."},{"time":616860,"text":"We did it anyway."}]},{"cues":[{"time":618804,"text":"(Applause)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":628736,"text":"Facebook, you were
on the wrong side of history in that."},{"time":632752,"text":"And you were on the wrong side
of history in this --"},{"time":636665,"text":"in refusing to give us
the answers that we need."},{"time":640696,"text":"And that is why I am here."},{"time":643006,"text":"To address you directly,
the gods of Silicon Valley."}]},{"cues":[{"time":647714,"text":"(Applause)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":651982,"text":"Mark Zuckerberg ..."}]},{"cues":[{"time":653275,"text":"(Applause)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":654926,"text":"and Sheryl Sandberg and Larry Page
and Sergey Brin and Jack Dorsey,"},{"time":663125,"text":"and your employees
and your investors, too."},{"time":667430,"text":"Because 100 years ago,"},{"time":669422,"text":"the biggest danger in the South Wales
coal mines was gas."},{"time":672223,"text":"Silent and deadly and invisible."},{"time":674651,"text":"It's why they sent the canaries
down first to check the air."},{"time":677707,"text":"And in this massive, global, online
experiment that we are all living through,"},{"time":681820,"text":"we in Britain are the canary."},{"time":684668,"text":"We are what happens to a western democracy"},{"time":687482,"text":"when a hundred years of electoral laws
are disrupted by technology."}]},{"cues":[{"time":693117,"text":"Our democracy is broken,
our laws don't work anymore,"},{"time":696966,"text":"and it's not me saying this,"},{"time":698688,"text":"it's our parliament published
a report saying this."},{"time":703180,"text":"This technology that you have
invented has been amazing."},{"time":708696,"text":"But now, it's a crime scene."},{"time":711927,"text":"And you have the evidence."},{"time":715553,"text":"And it is not enough to say
that you will do better in the future."},{"time":720973,"text":"Because to have any hope
of stopping this from happening again,"},{"time":725307,"text":"we have to know the truth."}]},{"cues":[{"time":729362,"text":"And maybe you think,
"Well, it was just a few ads."},{"time":732489,"text":"And people are smarter than that, right?""},{"time":736330,"text":"To which I would say,
"Good luck with that.""},{"time":740314,"text":"Because what the Brexit vote demonstrates"},{"time":743641,"text":"is that liberal democracy is broken."},{"time":747450,"text":"And you broke it."},{"time":750282,"text":"This is not democracy --"},{"time":752679,"text":"spreading lies in darkness,
paid for with illegal cash,"},{"time":758671,"text":"from God knows where."},{"time":761527,"text":"It's subversion,"},{"time":763678,"text":"and you are accessories to it."}]},{"cues":[{"time":768201,"text":"(Applause)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":777845,"text":"Our parliament has been
the first in the world"},{"time":781099,"text":"to try to hold you to account,"},{"time":783632,"text":"and it's failed."},{"time":785371,"text":"You are literally beyond the reach
of British law -- not just British laws,"},{"time":790244,"text":"this is nine parliaments,
nine countries are represented here,"},{"time":793522,"text":"who Mark Zuckerberg refused
to come and give evidence to."}]},{"cues":[{"time":798497,"text":"And what you don't seem to understand
is that this is bigger than you."},{"time":803092,"text":"And it's bigger than any of us."},{"time":805163,"text":"And it is not about left or right
or "Leave" or "Remain" or Trump or not."},{"time":811101,"text":"It's about whether it's actually possible"},{"time":813117,"text":"to have a free and fair
election ever again."},{"time":816497,"text":"Because as it stands, I don't think it is."}]},{"cues":[{"time":820275,"text":"And so my question to you is,
is this what you want?"},{"time":825172,"text":"Is this how you want
history to remember you:"},{"time":829223,"text":"as the handmaidens to authoritarianism"},{"time":833056,"text":"that is on the rise all across the world?"},{"time":838387,"text":"Because you set out to connect people."},{"time":841807,"text":"And you are refusing to acknowledge"},{"time":843859,"text":"that the same technology
is now driving us apart."}]},{"cues":[{"time":849038,"text":"And my question to everybody else is,"},{"time":851332,"text":"is this what we want:"},{"time":853903,"text":"to let them get away with it,"},{"time":856569,"text":"and to sit back and play with our phones,
as this darkness falls?"}]},{"cues":[{"time":862561,"text":"The history of the South Wales Valleys
is of a fight for rights."},{"time":868498,"text":"And this is not a drill --
it's a point of inflection."},{"time":873530,"text":"Democracy is not guaranteed,
and it is not inevitable,"},{"time":877174,"text":"and we have to fight and we have to win"},{"time":879753,"text":"and we cannot let these tech companies
have this unchecked power."},{"time":884563,"text":"It's up to us -- you, me and all of us."},{"time":887357,"text":"We are the ones
who have to take back control."}]},{"cues":[{"time":892619,"text":"(Applause)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":895695,"text":"(Cheers)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":898199,"text":"(Applause)"}]}]}

speaker: Nora McInerny
title: We don't "move on" from grief. We move forward with it
text:
{"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"time":896,"text":"So, 2014 was a big year for me."},{"time":3461,"text":"Do you ever have that,"},{"time":4651,"text":"just like a big year, like a banner year?"},{"time":7198,"text":"For me, it went like this:"},{"time":8659,"text":"October 3, I lost my second pregnancy."},{"time":11982,"text":"And then October 8, my dad died of cancer."},{"time":15101,"text":"And then on November 25,
my husband Aaron died"},{"time":17895,"text":"after three years
with stage-four glioblastoma,"},{"time":20697,"text":"which is just a fancy word
for brain cancer."}]},{"cues":[{"time":24822,"text":"So, I'm fun."}]},{"cues":[{"time":26639,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":28036,"text":"People love to invite me out all the time."},{"time":31901,"text":"Packed social life."},{"time":33331,"text":"Usually, when I talk
about this period of my life,"},{"time":36419,"text":"the reaction I get is essentially:"}]},{"cues":[{"time":39657,"text":"(Sighs)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":41616,"text":""I can't -- I can't imagine.""},{"time":45061,"text":"But I do think you can."},{"time":47696,"text":"I think you can."},{"time":48871,"text":"And I think that you should"},{"time":50262,"text":"because, someday,
it's going to happen to you."},{"time":52903,"text":"Maybe not these specific losses
in this specific order or at this speed,"},{"time":57585,"text":"but like I said, I'm very fun"},{"time":58999,"text":"and the research
that I have seen will stun you:"},{"time":62720,"text":"everyone you love has
a 100 percent chance of dying."}]},{"cues":[{"time":66354,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":68974,"text":"And that's why you came to TED."}]},{"cues":[{"time":70569,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":72655,"text":"(Applause)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":76292,"text":"So, since all of this loss happened,"},{"time":78046,"text":"I've made it a career
to talk about death and loss,"},{"time":82363,"text":"not just my own,
because it's pretty easy to recap,"},{"time":84807,"text":"but the losses and tragedies
that other people have experienced."},{"time":88877,"text":"It's a niche, I have to say."}]},{"cues":[{"time":91240,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":93005,"text":"It's a small niche,
and I wish I made more money, but ..."}]},{"cues":[{"time":96128,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":97482,"text":"I've written some very uplifting books,"},{"time":100617,"text":"host a very uplifting podcast,
I started a little nonprofit."},{"time":104334,"text":"I'm just trying to do what I can"},{"time":105958,"text":"to make more people comfortable
with the uncomfortable,"},{"time":109506,"text":"and grief is so uncomfortable."},{"time":112014,"text":"It's so uncomfortable,
especially if it's someone else's grief."},{"time":117323,"text":"So part of that work is this group
that I started with my friend Moe,"},{"time":121569,"text":"who is also a widow;"},{"time":122815,"text":"we call it the Hot Young Widows Club."}]},{"cues":[{"time":125374,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":126772,"text":"And it's real, we have membership cards"},{"time":129271,"text":"and T-shirts."},{"time":131272,"text":"And when your person dies,
your husband, wife, girlfriend, boyfriend,"},{"time":134976,"text":"literally don't care if you were married,"},{"time":136991,"text":"your friends and your family
are just going to look around"},{"time":139766,"text":"through friends of friends
of friends of friends"},{"time":142146,"text":"until they find someone
who's gone through something similar,"},{"time":145034,"text":"and then they'll push you
towards each other"},{"time":147419,"text":"so you can talk amongst yourselves
and not get your sad on other people."}]},{"cues":[{"time":151810,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":153993,"text":"So that's what we do."},{"time":155418,"text":"It's just a series of small groups,"},{"time":158934,"text":"where men, women, gay, straight,
married, partnered,"},{"time":162507,"text":"can talk about their dead person,"},{"time":166800,"text":"and say the things"},{"time":168070,"text":"that the other people in their lives
aren't ready or willing to hear yet."},{"time":171813,"text":"Huge range of conversations."},{"time":174315,"text":"Like, "My husband died two weeks ago,"},{"time":176127,"text":"I can't stop thinking
about sex, is that normal?""}]},{"cues":[{"time":178469,"text":"Yeah."}]},{"cues":[{"time":179647,"text":""What if it's one
of the Property Brothers?""}]},{"cues":[{"time":181720,"text":"Less normal, but I'll accept it."}]},{"cues":[{"time":183290,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":186910,"text":"Things like, "Look, when I'm out in public
and I see old people holding hands,"},{"time":190775,"text":"couples who have clearly
been together for decades,"},{"time":193385,"text":"and then I look at them and I imagine"},{"time":195736,"text":"all of the things they've been
through together,"},{"time":198006,"text":"the good things, the bad things,"},{"time":199569,"text":"the arguments they've had
over who should take out the trash ..."},{"time":202664,"text":"I just find my heart filled with rage.""}]},{"cues":[{"time":205720,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":206745,"text":"And that example is personal to me."}]},{"cues":[{"time":210077,"text":"Most of the conversations
that we have in the group"},{"time":213252,"text":"can and will just stay amongst ourselves,"},{"time":215253,"text":"but there are things that we talk about"},{"time":217196,"text":"that the rest of the world --
the world that is grief-adjacent"},{"time":220403,"text":"but not yet grief-stricken --"},{"time":221941,"text":"could really benefit from hearing."},{"time":223871,"text":"And if you can't tell,"},{"time":225173,"text":"I'm only interested in / capable
of unscientific studies,"},{"time":229577,"text":"so what I did was go to
The Hot Young Widows Club"},{"time":231975,"text":"and say, "Hello, friends, remember
when your person died?" They did."}]},{"cues":[{"time":236609,"text":""Do you remember all the things
people said to you?""}]},{"cues":[{"time":239118,"text":""Oh, yeah.""}]},{"cues":[{"time":240313,"text":""Which ones did you hate the most?""}]},{"cues":[{"time":242100,"text":"I got a lot of comments, lot of answers,
people say a lot of things,"},{"time":245331,"text":"but two rose to the top pretty quickly."},{"time":248990,"text":""Moving on.""}]},{"cues":[{"time":251561,"text":"Now, since 2014,"},{"time":254195,"text":"I will tell you I have remarried
a very handsome man named Matthew,"},{"time":258267,"text":"we have four children
in our blended family,"},{"time":261394,"text":"we live in the suburbs
of Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA."},{"time":264911,"text":"We have a rescue dog."}]},{"cues":[{"time":266355,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":267686,"text":"I drive a minivan,"},{"time":269122,"text":"like the kind where doors open
and I don't even touch them."}]},{"cues":[{"time":271962,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":273170,"text":"Like, by any "mezhure," life is good."},{"time":276387,"text":"I've also never said "mezhure,"
I've never once said it that way."}]},{"cues":[{"time":279483,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":284786,"text":"I don't know where that came from."}]},{"cues":[{"time":286461,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":288246,"text":"I've never heard
anyone else say it that way."},{"time":290545,"text":"It looks like it should be said that way,"},{"time":292546,"text":"and that's why the English
language is trash, so ..."}]},{"cues":[{"time":295127,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":296205,"text":"So impressed with anyone
who, like, speaks it"},{"time":298355,"text":"in addition to a language
that makes sense -- good job."}]},{"cues":[{"time":301252,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":303268,"text":"But by any measure ..."}]},{"cues":[{"time":304728,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":306252,"text":"By any measure, life is really,
really good, but I haven't "moved on.""},{"time":312085,"text":"I haven't moved on,
and I hate that phrase so much,"},{"time":315133,"text":"and I understand why other people do."},{"time":316948,"text":"Because what it says"},{"time":318122,"text":"is that Aaron's life and death
and love are just moments"},{"time":322734,"text":"that I can leave behind me --
and that I probably should."},{"time":326561,"text":"And when I talk about Aaron,
I slip so easily into the present tense,"},{"time":330815,"text":"and I've always though that made we weird."},{"time":333395,"text":"And then I noticed that everybody does it."},{"time":336595,"text":"And it's not because we are in denial
or because we're forgetful,"},{"time":340786,"text":"it's because the people
we love, who we've lost,"},{"time":343071,"text":"are still so present for us."},{"time":346800,"text":"So, when I say, "Oh, Aaron is ...""},{"time":350276,"text":"It's because Aaron still is."},{"time":353831,"text":"And it's not in the way
that he was before,"},{"time":355895,"text":"which was much better,"},{"time":357102,"text":"and it's not in the way that churchy
people try to tell me that he would be."},{"time":360768,"text":"It's just that he's indelible,"},{"time":365411,"text":"and so he is present for me."}]},{"cues":[{"time":368610,"text":"Here,"},{"time":369784,"text":"he's present for me in the work that I do,"},{"time":372067,"text":"in the child that we had together,"},{"time":374699,"text":"in these three other children I'm raising,"},{"time":376778,"text":"who never met him,
who share none of his DNA,"},{"time":379588,"text":"but who are only in my life
because I had Aaron"},{"time":383477,"text":"and because I lost Aaron."},{"time":386302,"text":"He's present in my marriage to Matthew,"},{"time":388677,"text":"because Aaron's life and love and death"},{"time":391906,"text":"made me the person
that Matthew wanted to marry."},{"time":394596,"text":"So I've not moved on from Aaron,"},{"time":398853,"text":"I've moved forward with him."}]},{"cues":[{"time":404925,"text":"(Applause)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":410995,"text":"We spread Aaron's ashes
in his favorite river in Minnesota,"},{"time":415686,"text":"and when the bag was empty --"},{"time":417217,"text":"because when you're cremated,
you fit into a plastic bag --"},{"time":421962,"text":"there were still ashes
stuck to my fingers."},{"time":424906,"text":"And I could have just put my hands
in the water and rinsed them,"},{"time":428017,"text":"but instead, I licked my hands clean,"},{"time":431617,"text":"because I was so afraid of losing more
than I had already lost,"},{"time":435363,"text":"and I was so desperate to make sure
that he would always be a part of me."},{"time":440371,"text":"But of course he would be."}]},{"cues":[{"time":442878,"text":"Because when you watch your person
fill himself with poison for three years,"},{"time":447363,"text":"just so he can stay alive
a little bit longer with you,"},{"time":450047,"text":"that stays with you."},{"time":453196,"text":"When you watch him fade from the healthy
person he was the night you met"},{"time":457870,"text":"to nothing, that stays with you."},{"time":459477,"text":"When you watch your son,
who isn't even two years old yet,"},{"time":462338,"text":"walk up to his father's bed
on the last day of his life,"},{"time":465053,"text":"like he knows what's coming
in a few hours,"},{"time":467347,"text":"and say, "I love you. All done. Bye, bye.""},{"time":473776,"text":"That stays with you."},{"time":477347,"text":"Just like when you fall in love,
finally, like really fall in love"},{"time":482061,"text":"with someone who gets you and sees you"},{"time":484427,"text":"and you even see, "Oh, my God,
I've been wrong this entire time."},{"time":487548,"text":"Love is not a contest
or a reality show -- it's so quiet,"},{"time":492356,"text":"it's this invisible thread of calm
that connects the two of us"},{"time":496069,"text":"even when everything is chaos,"},{"time":497861,"text":"when things are falling apart,
even when he's gone.""},{"time":502474,"text":"That stays with you."},{"time":506958,"text":"We used to do this thing --"},{"time":508353,"text":"because my hands are always
freezing and he's so warm,"},{"time":511012,"text":"where I would take my ice-cold hands
and shove them up his shirt ..."},{"time":514886,"text":"press them against his hot bod."}]},{"cues":[{"time":516919,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":519405,"text":"And he hated it so much,"}]},{"cues":[{"time":521944,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":522989,"text":"but he loved me,"},{"time":524371,"text":"and after he died,
I laid in bed with Aaron"},{"time":529252,"text":"and I put my hands underneath him"},{"time":533355,"text":"and I felt his warmth."},{"time":538374,"text":"And I can't even tell you
if my hands were cold,"},{"time":541905,"text":"but I can tell you"},{"time":543485,"text":"that I knew it was the last time
I would ever do that."},{"time":548209,"text":"And that that memory
is always going to be sad."},{"time":551733,"text":"That memory will always hurt."},{"time":554051,"text":"Even when I'm 600 years old
and I'm just a hologram."}]},{"cues":[{"time":556919,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":560204,"text":"Just like the memory of meeting him
is always going to make me laugh."},{"time":567860,"text":"Grief doesn't happen in this vacuum,"},{"time":569678,"text":"it happens alongside of and mixed in
with all of these other emotions."}]},{"cues":[{"time":578024,"text":"So, I met Matthew, my current husband --"},{"time":582596,"text":"who doesn't love that title,"}]},{"cues":[{"time":584492,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":588713,"text":"but it's so accurate."}]},{"cues":[{"time":590213,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":593935,"text":"I met Matthew, and ..."},{"time":597577,"text":"there was this audible sigh of relief
among the people who love me,"},{"time":600932,"text":"like, "It's over!"},{"time":604680,"text":"She did it."},{"time":607069,"text":"She got a happy ending,
we can all go home."},{"time":609561,"text":"And we did good.""},{"time":611586,"text":"And that narrative
is so appealing even to me,"},{"time":614633,"text":"and I thought maybe
I had gotten that, too, but I didn't."},{"time":618499,"text":"I got another chapter."},{"time":621061,"text":"And it's such a good chapter --
I love you, honey --"},{"time":625030,"text":"it's such a good chapter."},{"time":627419,"text":"But especially at the beginning,
it was like an alternate universe,"},{"time":631304,"text":"or one of those old "choose your
own adventure" books from the '80s"},{"time":634486,"text":"where there are two parallel plot lines."},{"time":636438,"text":"So I opened my heart to Matthew,"},{"time":638056,"text":"and my brain was like,
"Would you like to think about Aaron?"},{"time":642409,"text":"Like, the past, the present, future,
just get in there," and I did."},{"time":647052,"text":"And all of a sudden,
those two plots were unfurling at once,"},{"time":650165,"text":"and failing in love with Matthew
really helped me realize the enormity"},{"time":653776,"text":"of what I lost when Aaron died."},{"time":657680,"text":"And just as importantly,"},{"time":658867,"text":"it helped me realize
that my love for Aaron"},{"time":662641,"text":"and my grief for Aaron,"},{"time":664776,"text":"and my love for Matthew,
are not opposing forces."},{"time":670680,"text":"They are just strands to the same thread."},{"time":674111,"text":"They're the same stuff."}]},{"cues":[{"time":678000,"text":"I'm ... what would my parents say?"},{"time":681270,"text":"I'm not special."}]},{"cues":[{"time":683645,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":684684,"text":"They had four kids,
they were like ... frankly."}]},{"cues":[{"time":687244,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":689053,"text":"But I'm not, I'm not special."},{"time":690845,"text":"I know that, I'm fully aware"},{"time":692927,"text":"that all day, every day,
all around the world,"},{"time":695458,"text":"terrible things are happening."},{"time":697260,"text":"All the time."},{"time":698435,"text":"Like I said, fun person."},{"time":700204,"text":"But terrible things are happening,"},{"time":702714,"text":"people are experiencing deeply formative
and traumatic losses every day."},{"time":709132,"text":"And as part of my job,"},{"time":711744,"text":"this weird podcast that I have,"},{"time":713450,"text":"I sometimes talk to people"},{"time":714722,"text":"about the worst thing
that's ever happened to them."},{"time":717730,"text":"And sometimes, that's the loss
of someone they love,"},{"time":720785,"text":"sometimes days ago or weeks ago,
years ago, even decades ago."},{"time":726373,"text":"And these people that I interview,"},{"time":728927,"text":"they haven't closed themselves
around this loss"},{"time":731259,"text":"and made it the center of their lives."},{"time":733911,"text":"They've lived, their worlds
have kept spinning."},{"time":739478,"text":"But they're talking to me,
a total stranger,"},{"time":742644,"text":"about the person they love who has died,"},{"time":744603,"text":"because these are the experiences"},{"time":747767,"text":"that mark us and make us
just as much as the joyful ones."},{"time":753355,"text":"And just as permanently."},{"time":756895,"text":"Long after you get your last sympathy card"},{"time":759490,"text":"or your last hot dish."},{"time":761546,"text":"Like, we don't look
at the people around us"},{"time":763601,"text":"experiencing life's joys and wonders
and tell them to "move on," do we?"},{"time":768124,"text":"We don't send a card that's like,
"Congratulations on your beautiful baby,""},{"time":771704,"text":"and then, five years later, think like,
"Another birthday party? Get over it.""}]},{"cues":[{"time":775419,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":777109,"text":"Yeah, we get it, he's five."}]},{"cues":[{"time":778792,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":780244,"text":"Wow."}]},{"cues":[{"time":781442,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":784148,"text":"But grief is kind of one of those things,"},{"time":786188,"text":"like, falling in love or having a baby
or watching "The Wire" on HBO,"},{"time":789991,"text":"where you don't get it
until you get it, until you do it."},{"time":795219,"text":"And once you do it,
once it's your love or your baby,"},{"time":800546,"text":"once it's your grief
and your front row at the funeral,"},{"time":805760,"text":"you get it."},{"time":807315,"text":"You understand what you're experiencing
is not a moment in time,"},{"time":811475,"text":"it's not a bone that will reset,"},{"time":813441,"text":"but that you've been touched
by something chronic."},{"time":816919,"text":"Something incurable."},{"time":818141,"text":"It's not fatal, but sometimes
grief feels like it could be."},{"time":823269,"text":"And if we can't prevent it in one another,"},{"time":826872,"text":"what can we do?"}]},{"cues":[{"time":830554,"text":"What can we do other than try
to remind one another"},{"time":834898,"text":"that some things can't be fixed,"},{"time":838136,"text":"and not all wounds are meant to heal?"},{"time":842493,"text":"We need each other to remember,"},{"time":845708,"text":"to help each other remember,"},{"time":847494,"text":"that grief is this multitasking emotion."},{"time":850287,"text":"That you can and will be sad, and happy;
you'll be grieving, and able to love"},{"time":856108,"text":"in the same year or week, the same breath."},{"time":860982,"text":"We need to remember that a grieving person
is going to laugh again and smile again."},{"time":867498,"text":"If they're lucky,
they'll even find love again."},{"time":871697,"text":"But yes, absolutely,
they're going to move forward."},{"time":876071,"text":"But that doesn't mean
that they've moved on."}]},{"cues":[{"time":880253,"text":"Thank you."}]},{"cues":[{"time":881436,"text":"(Applause)"}]}]}

speaker: Jean-Baptiste P. Koehl
title: Why are earthquakes so hard to predict?
text:
{"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"time":7525,"text":"In 132 CE,"},{"time":9815,"text":"Chinese polymath Zhang Heng"},{"time":12145,"text":"presented the Han court with 
his latest invention."},{"time":15585,"text":"This large vase, he claimed,"},{"time":17675,"text":"could tell them whenever an earthquake 
occurred in their kingdom–"},{"time":21325,"text":"including the direction 
they should send aid."},{"time":24595,"text":"The court was somewhat skeptical,"},{"time":26505,"text":"especially when the device triggered 
on a seemingly quiet afternoon."},{"time":31005,"text":"But when messengers came 
for help days later,"},{"time":34054,"text":"their doubts turned to gratitude."},{"time":36614,"text":"Today, we no longer rely on pots to 
identify seismic events,"},{"time":41114,"text":"but earthquakes still offer a unique
challenge to those trying to track them."},{"time":46150,"text":"So why are earthquakes so 
hard to anticipate,"},{"time":49139,"text":"and how could we get better 
at predicting them?"}]},{"cues":[{"time":52039,"text":"To answer that,"},{"time":53099,"text":"we need to understand some theories 
behind how earthquakes occur."},{"time":57539,"text":"Earth’s crust is made from several vast, 
jagged slabs of rock"},{"time":61794,"text":"called tectonic plates,"},{"time":63749,"text":"each riding on a hot, partially molten
layer of Earth’s mantle."},{"time":68479,"text":"This causes the plates to 
spread very slowly,"},{"time":71289,"text":"at anywhere from 1 to 20 
centimeters per year."},{"time":74839,"text":"But these tiny movements are powerful 
enough"},{"time":77289,"text":"to cause deep cracks in the
interacting plates."},{"time":80799,"text":"And in unstable zones,"},{"time":82399,"text":"the intensifying pressure may 
ultimately trigger an earthquake."}]},{"cues":[{"time":87219,"text":"It’s hard enough to monitor these 
miniscule movements,"},{"time":90249,"text":"but the factors that turn shifts into 
seismic events are far more varied."},{"time":95589,"text":"Different fault lines juxtapose 
different rocks–"},{"time":98399,"text":"some of which are stronger–or weaker–
under pressure."},{"time":102269,"text":"Diverse rocks also react differently to
friction and high temperatures."},{"time":106979,"text":"Some partially melt, and can release
lubricating fluids"},{"time":110431,"text":"made of superheated minerals"},{"time":112230,"text":"that reduce fault line friction."},{"time":114420,"text":"But some are left dry,"},{"time":116370,"text":"prone to dangerous build-ups of pressure."},{"time":119140,"text":"And all these faults are subject to 
varying gravitational forces,"},{"time":123680,"text":"as well as the currents of hot rocks
moving throughout Earth’s mantle."}]},{"cues":[{"time":128531,"text":"So which of these hidden variables 
should we be analyzing,"},{"time":131755,"text":"and how do they fit into our 
growing prediction toolkit?"}]},{"cues":[{"time":135955,"text":"Because some of these forces occur 
at largely constant rates,"},{"time":139829,"text":"the behavior of the plates 
is somewhat cyclical."},{"time":143159,"text":"Today, many of our most reliable clues 
come from long-term forecasting,"},{"time":147609,"text":"related to when and where earthquakes 
have previously occurred."},{"time":151893,"text":"At the scale of millennia,"},{"time":153573,"text":"this allows us to make predictions 
about when highly active faults,"},{"time":157533,"text":"like the San Andreas,"},{"time":158873,"text":"are overdue for a massive earthquake."}]},{"cues":[{"time":161943,"text":"But due to the many variables involved,"},{"time":164193,"text":"this method can only predict 
very loose timeframes."},{"time":167783,"text":"To predict more imminent events,"},{"time":169693,"text":"researchers have investigated the 
vibrations Earth elicits before a quake."},{"time":175303,"text":"Geologists have long used seismometers"},{"time":177990,"text":"to track and map these tiny shifts
in the earth’s crust."},{"time":181920,"text":"And today, most smartphones are 
also capable"},{"time":184910,"text":"of recording primary seismic waves."},{"time":187670,"text":"With a network of phones around the globe,"},{"time":189740,"text":"scientists could potentially 
crowdsource a rich,"},{"time":192680,"text":"detailed warning system that alerts 
people to incoming quakes."},{"time":196945,"text":"Unfortunately, phones might not be able
to provide the advance notice needed"},{"time":201325,"text":"to enact safety protocols."},{"time":203355,"text":"But such detailed readings 
would still be useful"},{"time":206075,"text":"for prediction tools like NASA’s 
Quakesim software,"},{"time":209425,"text":"which can use a rigorous blend of 
geological data"},{"time":212255,"text":"to identify regions at risk."}]},{"cues":[{"time":214765,"text":"However, recent studies indicate"},{"time":216765,"text":"the most telling signs of a quake might be
invisible to all these sensors."},{"time":221635,"text":"In 2011,"},{"time":223005,"text":"just before an earthquake struck 
the east coast of Japan,"},{"time":226265,"text":"nearby researchers recorded surprisingly 
high concentrations"},{"time":230065,"text":"of the radioactive isotope pair: 
radon and thoron."},{"time":234425,"text":"As stress builds up in the crust right 
before an earthquake,"},{"time":238167,"text":"microfractures allow these gases 
to escape to the surface."},{"time":242407,"text":"These scientists think that if we built 
a vast network of radon-thoron detectors"},{"time":247042,"text":"in earthquake-prone areas,"},{"time":248992,"text":"it could become a promising 
warning system–"},{"time":251522,"text":"potentially predicting quakes 
a week in advance."}]},{"cues":[{"time":254532,"text":"Of course,"},{"time":255232,"text":"none of these technologies 
would be as helpful"},{"time":257432,"text":"as simply looking deep inside 
the earth itself."},{"time":260572,"text":"With a deeper view we might be able"},{"time":262242,"text":"to track and predict large-scale 
geological changes in real time,"},{"time":266852,"text":"possibly saving tens of thousands 
of lives a year."},{"time":270024,"text":"But for now,"},{"time":270874,"text":"these technologies can help us prepare 
and respond quickly to areas in need–"},{"time":275404,"text":"without waiting for directions 
from a vase."}]}]}

speaker: Muhammed Idris
title: What refugees need to start new lives
text:
{"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"time":1269,"text":"About two years ago,"},{"time":2477,"text":"I got a phone call that changed my life."}]},{"cues":[{"time":5687,"text":""Hey, this is your cousin Hassen.""}]},{"cues":[{"time":9482,"text":"I froze."},{"time":11101,"text":"You see, I have well over
30 first cousins,"},{"time":14231,"text":"but I didn't know anybody named Hassen."}]},{"cues":[{"time":17712,"text":"It turned out that Hassen
was actually my mom's cousin"},{"time":20371,"text":"and had just arrived
in Montreal as a refugee."},{"time":23422,"text":"And over the next few months,"},{"time":24958,"text":"I would have three more relatives
coming to Canada to apply for asylum"},{"time":28315,"text":"with little more than
the clothes on their back."},{"time":31640,"text":"And in the two years
since that phone call,"},{"time":33693,"text":"my life has completely changed."},{"time":36162,"text":"I left academia"},{"time":37412,"text":"and now lead a diverse team
of technologists, researchers and refugees"},{"time":41862,"text":"that is developing customized
self-help resources for newcomers."},{"time":46418,"text":"We want to help them overcome
language, cultural and other barriers"},{"time":50492,"text":"that make them feel like they've lost
control over their own lives."},{"time":54070,"text":"And we feel that AI can help restore
the rights and the dignity"},{"time":57258,"text":"that many people lose when seeking help."}]},{"cues":[{"time":60559,"text":"My family's refugee experience
is not unique."},{"time":64384,"text":"According to the UNHCR,"},{"time":66179,"text":"every minute, 20 people
are newly displaced"},{"time":69273,"text":"by climate change, economic crisis"},{"time":71677,"text":"and social and political instability."},{"time":74441,"text":"And it was while volunteering
at a local YMCA shelter"},{"time":77257,"text":"that my cousin Hassen
and other relatives were sent to"},{"time":80251,"text":"that we saw and learned to appreciate"},{"time":82589,"text":"how much effort and coordination
resettlement requires."}]},{"cues":[{"time":87042,"text":"When you first arrive,
you need to find a lawyer"},{"time":90546,"text":"and fill out legal documents
within two weeks."},{"time":93052,"text":"You also need to schedule a medical exam
with a pre-authorized physician,"},{"time":97108,"text":"just so that you can apply
for a work permit."},{"time":99675,"text":"And you need to start looking
for a place to live"},{"time":102102,"text":"before you receive
any sort of social assistance."}]},{"cues":[{"time":106719,"text":"With thousands fleeing the United States"},{"time":108857,"text":"to seek asylum in Canada
over the past few years,"},{"time":111220,"text":"we quickly saw what it looks like"},{"time":112887,"text":"when there are more people who need help
than there are resources to help them."},{"time":117004,"text":"Social services doesn't scale quickly,"},{"time":119970,"text":"and even if communities do their best"},{"time":122543,"text":"to help more people
with limited resources,"},{"time":125312,"text":"newcomers end up spending
more time waiting in limbo,"},{"time":127963,"text":"not knowing where to turn."}]},{"cues":[{"time":130457,"text":"In Montreal, for example,"},{"time":131936,"text":"despite millions of dollars being spent
to support resettlement efforts,"},{"time":135668,"text":"nearly 50 percent of newcomers
still don't know"},{"time":138224,"text":"that there are free resources that exist"},{"time":140550,"text":"to help them with everything
from filling out paperwork"},{"time":143167,"text":"to finding a job."},{"time":145292,"text":"The challenge is not
that this information doesn't exist."},{"time":149064,"text":"On the contrary, those in need are often
bombarded with so much information"},{"time":153488,"text":"that it's difficult
to make sense of it all."},{"time":156957,"text":""Don't give me more information,
just tell me what to do,""},{"time":160525,"text":"was a sentiment we heard
over and over again."},{"time":163735,"text":"And it reflects how insanely difficult
it could be to get your bearings"},{"time":167464,"text":"when you first arrive in a new country."},{"time":170603,"text":"Hell, I struggled with the same issues
when I got to Montreal,"},{"time":174379,"text":"and I have a PhD."}]},{"cues":[{"time":176234,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":178068,"text":"As another member of our team,
himself also a refugee, put it:"},{"time":182001,"text":""In Canada, a SIM card
is more important than food,"},{"time":185303,"text":"because we will not die from hunger.""},{"time":188005,"text":"But getting access to the right
resources and information"},{"time":191315,"text":"can be the difference
between life and death."},{"time":195465,"text":"Let me say that again:"},{"time":196918,"text":"getting access to the right
resources and information"},{"time":200073,"text":"can be the difference
between life and death."}]},{"cues":[{"time":205347,"text":"In order to address these issues,"},{"time":206982,"text":"we built Atar,"},{"time":208692,"text":"the first-ever AI-powered virtual advocate"},{"time":211626,"text":"that guides you step-by-step
through your first week"},{"time":214264,"text":"of arriving in a new city."},{"time":215778,"text":"Just tell Atar what you need help with."},{"time":218747,"text":"Atar will then ask you
some basic questions"},{"time":220859,"text":"to understand your unique circumstances"},{"time":222927,"text":"and determine your eligibility
for resources."},{"time":225847,"text":"For example: Do you have
a place to stay tonight?"},{"time":229845,"text":"If not, would you prefer
an all-women's shelter?"},{"time":233232,"text":"Do you have children?"},{"time":235442,"text":"Atar will then generate
a custom, step-by-step to-do list"},{"time":238608,"text":"that tells you everything
that you need to know,"},{"time":240921,"text":"from where to go, how to get there,"},{"time":243670,"text":"what to bring with you"},{"time":244896,"text":"and what to expect."},{"time":246924,"text":"You can ask a question at any time,"},{"time":249335,"text":"and if Atar doesn't have an answer,"},{"time":251052,"text":"you'll be connected
with a real person who does."}]},{"cues":[{"time":254775,"text":"But what's most exciting"},{"time":257077,"text":"is that we help humanitarian
and service organizations"},{"time":260176,"text":"collect the data and the analytics
that's necessary to understand"},{"time":264235,"text":"the changing needs of newcomers"},{"time":265880,"text":"in real time."},{"time":267904,"text":"That's a game changer."},{"time":270282,"text":"We've already partnered with the UNHCR"},{"time":272345,"text":"to provide this technology in Canada,"},{"time":274239,"text":"and in our work have conducted
campaigns in Arabic, English,"},{"time":278072,"text":"French, Creole and Spanish."}]},{"cues":[{"time":282246,"text":"When we talk about the issue of refugees,"},{"time":285201,"text":"we often focus on the official statistic"},{"time":287242,"text":"of 65.8 million forcibly
displaced worldwide."},{"time":291870,"text":"But the reality is much greater than that."},{"time":295193,"text":"By 2050, there will be
an additional 140 million people"},{"time":300375,"text":"who are at risk of being displaced
due to environmental degradation."},{"time":304412,"text":"And today -- that is today --
there are nearly one billion people"},{"time":309224,"text":"who already live in illegal
settlements and slums."},{"time":313356,"text":"Resettlement and integration"},{"time":315324,"text":"is one of the greatest
challenges of our time."},{"time":318883,"text":"and our hope is that Atar can provide
every single newcomer an advocate."},{"time":324212,"text":"Our hope is that Atar
can amplify existing efforts"},{"time":328507,"text":"and alleviate pressure
on a social safety net"},{"time":331189,"text":"that's already stretched
beyond imagination."},{"time":335183,"text":"But what's most important to us"},{"time":337653,"text":"is that our work helps restore
the rights and the dignity"},{"time":342281,"text":"that refugees lose throughout
resettlement and integration"},{"time":345856,"text":"by giving them the resources that
they need in order to help themselves."}]},{"cues":[{"time":350197,"text":"Thank you."}]},{"cues":[{"time":351453,"text":"(Applause)"}]}]}

speaker: Yuko Morita
title: Why we need more dogs in hospitals
text:
{"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"time":12170,"text":"(Directing Bailey in English)"},{"time":19395,"text":"Hello, everyone."},{"time":21591,"text":"My name is Yuko Morita."},{"time":23152,"text":"This is a facility dog, Bailey."},{"time":27411,"text":"When you were a kid,
were you afraid of getting shots?"},{"time":32272,"text":"When you were getting 
a flu shot at school,"},{"time":35893,"text":"you probably asked your friends,
'Did it hurt? Did it hurt?'"},{"time":41192,"text":"As you know, kids are 
very afraid of injections"},{"time":45284,"text":"or having their blood drawn."},{"time":48284,"text":"Hospitalised children have to have 
their blood drawn so many times."},{"time":54112,"text":"Some kids need bone-marrow aspirations"},{"time":57963,"text":"by drilling a thick needle 
into their spine."},{"time":61703,"text":"This dog, Bailey has the magical power 
to make these kids say:"},{"time":65271,"text":"'If Bailey is with me,
I would put up with it 100 more times'."},{"time":68311,"text":"He is such a competent dog."},{"time":73063,"text":"The Japanese medical level 
is said to be top-notch,"},{"time":77423,"text":"for curing diseases."},{"time":82204,"text":"But in Japan, while 'to be patient' 
has been considered a virtue,"},{"time":85964,"text":"it is said that the quality 
of hospitalised life is poorly supported."},{"time":93264,"text":"I used to work as a registered nurse 
at a children's hospital in Tokyo."},{"time":98395,"text":"One day a mother 
of a hospitalised kid said,"},{"time":102854,"text":"'This is almost like being in jail'."},{"time":107454,"text":"I was thinking that I was working 
very hard for the children,"},{"time":112465,"text":"and I was very shocked to hear that."},{"time":117095,"text":"In fact, kids in the hospital are not 
supposed to go out even for a walk."},{"time":122875,"text":"They are not allowed 
to have their favourite foods."},{"time":125985,"text":"They barely have fun."},{"time":128406,"text":"Some kids stop smiling."},{"time":132156,"text":"When I think back about it,
it might as well be called a jail."},{"time":140876,"text":"At that time,
I was with an NPO"},{"time":144205,"text":"called 'Shine On! Kids'"},{"time":147616,"text":"and they offered to let me 
become a handler of a service dog."},{"time":152035,"text":"The Non-Profit Organisation was founded 
to emotionally support kids"},{"time":156148,"text":"and their families who are suffering 
from childhood cancer"},{"time":160078,"text":"and other incurable diseases."},{"time":163066,"text":"At that time, I only knew that 
a dog is taken to a children's hospital"},{"time":167786,"text":"and the dog works as a member 
of the medical staff --"},{"time":172496,"text":"there were a number of facility dogs 
working in Europe and the US,"},{"time":176646,"text":"yet obiously none in Japan;"},{"time":179817,"text":"that was all I knew about facility dogs."},{"time":183747,"text":"I thought 'If a service dog 
were working in this ward,"},{"time":188267,"text":"the children's hospital life,
once called a jail, would be way happier',"},{"time":192807,"text":"and I was excited to think so."},{"time":195107,"text":"Without hesitation I said,
'Yes, I would love to'."},{"time":200426,"text":"There is no training institutions 
for facility dog program in Japan."},{"time":204717,"text":"Both Bailey and I were trained 
at a Hawaiian training centre."},{"time":211607,"text":"In a children's hospital in Hawaii,"},{"time":213362,"text":"we also practiced following around 
our senior facility dog and their handler."},{"time":218863,"text":"To my surprise, the service dog 
went into the ICU."},{"time":222273,"text":"The intensive-care unit is where 
seriously ill patients are taken care of."},{"time":228127,"text":"There was a child who had just gotten out 
of surgery with their head half-shaven,"},{"time":232997,"text":"and a large scar on their head."},{"time":236157,"text":"The kid was frowing painfully."},{"time":240108,"text":"To my great concern, 'Is it really OK 
to go there in such a serious situation?'"},{"time":245007,"text":"the facility dog went in there,"},{"time":246898,"text":"and climbed on the bed 
right beside the kid"},{"time":249879,"text":"laying with the tubes around them,
and went to sleep alongside the kid."},{"time":253509,"text":"Then the kid grew relaxed."},{"time":258008,"text":"In spite of all the pain of moving,"},{"time":261019,"text":"the kid hugged the dog 
and closed their eyes."},{"time":265091,"text":"The kid looked so calm and easy."},{"time":269279,"text":"At the sight of it,
I thought ’WOW, that's cool!’"},{"time":273869,"text":"Being excited about making 
all the hospital wards full of smiles,"},{"time":277059,"text":"I came back to Japan with Bailey."},{"time":280339,"text":"However, facility dogs are totally 
unprecedented in Japan."},{"time":285290,"text":"The Western mindset for dogs 
is totally different from that of Japan."},{"time":291029,"text":"In Europe and the US, it's been 
quite normal to have dogs"},{"time":294490,"text":"in the house as family members."},{"time":299180,"text":"On the other hand, in Japan,
we have a history of having them outside."},{"time":305080,"text":"It is outrageous to have a dog 
inside the hospital ward:"},{"time":308610,"text":"that was what Japanese hospitals thought."},{"time":313140,"text":"Before us, sometimes there were dogs 
volunteered to visit hospitals in Japan."},{"time":319820,"text":"But there was not a precedent"},{"time":324359,"text":"of having a dog in hospital everyday,
and considering dogs as a medical staff."},{"time":330510,"text":"What was right in Hawaii 
was far from right in Japan."},{"time":337081,"text":"We desperately looked for a hospital 
that could accept Bailey as a staff."},{"time":342577,"text":"Then eventually we were accepted 
by the Shizuoka Children's Hospital."},{"time":349271,"text":"But the reality was that people said;"},{"time":353030,"text":"'Can't the dog be replaced 
with a dog robot?'"},{"time":356221,"text":"or 'To protect kids against infections,
do not enter this ward'."},{"time":361091,"text":"At first we could enter only one ward."},{"time":365204,"text":"So one-day of rounds was finished 
in a few minutes."},{"time":368172,"text":"We got to the workplace and an hour later,
it was time to go home."},{"time":373001,"text":"'I don't think Japanese culture 
is going to make people"},{"time":376162,"text":"want to adopt a facility dog programme',
I could only think in a negative way."},{"time":383321,"text":"But in fact, children needed Bailey."},{"time":387741,"text":"Five years have passed,"},{"time":389414,"text":"and now we are accepted 
by almost all wards."},{"time":394024,"text":"Bailey brings about positive differences 
to both kids and their families',"},{"time":400422,"text":"-- that was what doctors and nurses 
started to notice."},{"time":406001,"text":"There was a child 
who was visually impaired"},{"time":408562,"text":"and was always screaming in panic 
when they had their blood collected."},{"time":413272,"text":"But with Bailey by their side, they were 
distracted by petting Bailey on the head,"},{"time":417901,"text":"the kid could go through blood tests 
without crying."},{"time":420963,"text":"Another kid who wouldn’t move at all 
due to pain after surgery"},{"time":424062,"text":"suddenly got up 
just because they wanted to see Bailey."},{"time":426825,"text":"That was a big surprise to the doctor."},{"time":431543,"text":"A family, who are suddenly told 
that their child has cancer,"},{"time":439873,"text":"will pretend as if nothing happening 
to prevent their kid from being nervous."},{"time":445773,"text":"But people cannot suppress 
their feelings for good."},{"time":451103,"text":"Sometimes it is important to cry."},{"time":455248,"text":"With somebody who is human,"},{"time":457291,"text":"they would feel a need 
'to say something'."},{"time":460523,"text":"But to Bailey, they never have to 
say anything if they do not want to."},{"time":465284,"text":"I saw a mother in a hospital corridor,
after hugging Bailey, crying as she wanted"},{"time":470144,"text":"and with a relaxed expression,
she went back to her kid's bed."},{"time":476475,"text":"Bailey was a positive influence 
for their families, too."},{"time":484194,"text":"Then I found there are 
three important bonds for a facility dog."},{"time":491854,"text":"One is a bond between Bailey and the kids,"},{"time":494925,"text":"another is Bailey and his handler,"},{"time":497645,"text":"and the other is 
Bailey and the medical staff."},{"time":500374,"text":"These are three important bonds 
with Bailey."},{"time":503825,"text":"The first bond is:"},{"time":506994,"text":"as Bailey works 
at the same hospital everyday,"},{"time":510705,"text":"he sees the same children many times."},{"time":513577,"text":"For children, just having a dog 
is not good enough."},{"time":518465,"text":"Bailey, who comes to them everyday,
really matters."},{"time":522005,"text":"Only with Bailey 
who has bonds with the kids,"},{"time":524766,"text":"can they be courageous enough 
to hang in there."},{"time":528656,"text":"Even with a dog phobia, almost all kids 
will come to like Bailey eventually."},{"time":534315,"text":"For kids, Bailey is a teammate with a tail
who fight against their illness."},{"time":543525,"text":"Bailey can even enter 
the surgical theatre with a child."},{"time":548896,"text":"Even an adult is scared 
of getting an operation, right?"},{"time":554335,"text":"Wondering 'Does it hurt?',
or feeling scared,"},{"time":557697,"text":"they have to spend the terrifying time 
from the ward to the theatre."},{"time":564446,"text":"But holding Bailey's leash,
walking with him,"},{"time":567847,"text":"children can guide Bailey 
smiling and walking to the theatre."},{"time":574205,"text":"It is a privilege walk with everyone's 
favourite Bailey, without anyone else!"},{"time":580116,"text":"Some kids walk playfully 
around Bailey's fluffy tail"},{"time":582637,"text":"as if they are cats."},{"time":585928,"text":"Some kids say smiling, 'Bailey's 
wagging his tail means Good Luck'."},{"time":592156,"text":"In this way, scary feelings 
turn to exciting feelings;"},{"time":596436,"text":"which encourages kids 
to go to the theatre."}]},{"cues":[{"time":601647,"text":"The second bond is:"},{"time":603767,"text":"between a facility dog and their hander,
who live together twenty-four seven."},{"time":609726,"text":"We always spend holidays together too."},{"time":612548,"text":"This is very important;
just getting together while working"},{"time":615488,"text":"and saying 'Bye-Bye' after five 
doesn't make any sense."},{"time":620297,"text":"We sleep at night and Bailey sleeps 
with his head on my arm."},{"time":626505,"text":"The bond between a facility dog 
and their handler"},{"time":630158,"text":"is the basis on which a facility dog 
works professionally."},{"time":635458,"text":"Only the bond with me"},{"time":637647,"text":"can convince Bailey 
to trust me to work together."},{"time":643697,"text":"But the truth is;"},{"time":645468,"text":"you may think that a training dog 
will do anything I say,"},{"time":651018,"text":"Bailey is a stubborn guy 
who goes only where he wants."},{"time":656528,"text":"To a direction he doesn't to want to go,
he does like this."},{"time":659689,"text":"Can you see he is hanging on 
with all his might?"},{"time":662058,"text":"Planting his feet firmly on the ground,
digging his nails into it,"},{"time":665237,"text":"he never goes where he doesn't want to."},{"time":667700,"text":"While walking on the street,"},{"time":669479,"text":"I sometimes struggle 
with Bailey sitting there."},{"time":672549,"text":"People passing by always say laughing,
'That's troublesome'."},{"time":677889,"text":"But he has never refused 
to go to the hospital."},{"time":683350,"text":"On the contrary, he sometimes 
refuses to go home, squatting there,"},{"time":686878,"text":"going back into the hospital ward."},{"time":690278,"text":"Dogs easily understand 
what people are thinking about them."},{"time":696959,"text":"Because there are many people 
who love him,"},{"time":700429,"text":"Bailey loves the hospital very much."},{"time":704269,"text":"Both a dog and people 
are mutually affected;"},{"time":707330,"text":"that is where the facility dog belongs."},{"time":710959,"text":"This is why non-sentient toy dogs 
cannot make this happen."},{"time":715581,"text":"A robot dog can not make this happen."},{"time":718930,"text":"The third bond is 
between Bailey and the medical staff."},{"time":726429,"text":"The handler of a facility dog 
is a medical staff."},{"time":730530,"text":"The reason why only medical staff 
can be a handler of a facility dog is:"},{"time":734701,"text":"that a facility dog's work includes 
not only healing mentally,"},{"time":740060,"text":"but also curing physically."},{"time":744780,"text":"Bailey and I sometimes take a part 
in the conversations"},{"time":748352,"text":"where treatment courses 
of patients are decided."},{"time":751752,"text":"I also figure out 
how our patient kids are"},{"time":755621,"text":"and work out 
how to approach this patient."},{"time":759642,"text":"I also write on the medical charts."},{"time":762921,"text":"In this way, to be involved 
with specific purpose"},{"time":766340,"text":"is what only facility dogs are capable of,"},{"time":769310,"text":"and why a handler of a facility dog 
must be certified medical staff."},{"time":775521,"text":"It has been five years since Bailey and I 
started working in Japan."},{"time":780491,"text":"We have met thousands of children."},{"time":786151,"text":"We once met a kid 
in the terminal phase of disease"},{"time":790350,"text":"and the kid could not eat."},{"time":792452,"text":"He wanted to but he couldn't eat;
that was his situation."},{"time":796642,"text":"Given a short span of time,
both his family and nurses"},{"time":801271,"text":"wished that he could enjoy 
whatever little amount of food he could."},{"time":806582,"text":"Then there was a suggestion made 
Bailey attended at his dinner table."},{"time":813641,"text":"With Bailey, the kid 
was happy to sit up smiling."},{"time":817933,"text":"Saying, 'Bailey, look at me',"},{"time":821462,"text":"though it was only a few mouthful,
but he could managed to grab spaghetti"},{"time":825542,"text":"into his mouth."},{"time":828311,"text":"He could also enjoy ice cream,"},{"time":831601,"text":"not being forced to do so,
but willingly to do so."},{"time":836153,"text":"Only the presence of Bailey bedside 
could make that level of change."},{"time":841034,"text":"The bad impression of a hospital 
changed so much as to make children say,"},{"time":845483,"text":"'I want to be hospitalised 
to see Bailey'."},{"time":849042,"text":"With Bailey,
kids can double their fun."},{"time":853112,"text":"With Bailey,
kids can share tears and fears."},{"time":859027,"text":"Most children are discharged 
from hospital safe and sound."},{"time":862085,"text":"But sadly, some kids have to 
leave this world forever,"},{"time":868064,"text":"and Bailey sometimes sleeps with them 
till just before their last moments."},{"time":874803,"text":"We say 'You know, Bailey's with you',"},{"time":878174,"text":"'It's warm, isn't?' to kids."},{"time":880704,"text":"The time goes on sadly 
but warmly."},{"time":888744,"text":"We sometimes attend a funeral 
for children."},{"time":894184,"text":"When parents have to close the lid 
of their own child's coffin,"},{"time":900414,"text":"can you imagine how they feel?"},{"time":907710,"text":"In fact every family says"},{"time":909186,"text":"'We were really happy 
to have Bailey with us'."},{"time":911454,"text":"They always say that."},{"time":913034,"text":"'Before Bailey, the hospital stay 
had been just so heart-wrenching'."},{"time":916314,"text":"'With Bailey our kid's life 
changed so much'."},{"time":918634,"text":"These are what bereaved families 
said to us."},{"time":921726,"text":"A family who lost their child 
will reflect on their child everyday,"},{"time":926466,"text":"through their long span of life."},{"time":930279,"text":"Remembering their child 
as 'a poor soul who went through"},{"time":936965,"text":"so many painful operations;
or remembering their child"},{"time":940046,"text":"as 'a laughing kid sleeping 
with Bailey just before death;"},{"time":943155,"text":"their feelings are completely different,
aren't they?"},{"time":946656,"text":"We wish to make 
a small portion of happiness"},{"time":949806,"text":"in their heartbreaking memory."},{"time":952806,"text":"We wish the bereaved family remember 
as many smiles of their kid as possible."},{"time":959005,"text":"The Facility Dog Programme 
is not an option,"},{"time":962995,"text":"but necessity for hospital care,
that's what I strongly feel about it."},{"time":968056,"text":"Japan's medical care is said to be 
the highest in the world."},{"time":971696,"text":"Not just curing disease,
but also having an environment"},{"time":976296,"text":"for healing disease more proactively 
is necessary, I think."},{"time":980665,"text":"For patients,
they can't have too much fun."},{"time":989009,"text":"There are a lot of facility dogs 
in Europe and the US,"},{"time":992147,"text":"but in Japan we have only two."},{"time":995187,"text":"I would like to have facility dogs 
as a standard in Japanese hospitals"},{"time":998857,"text":"and make Japanese hospitals 
a fun place to be in,"},{"time":1001246,"text":"even for patients 
who have medical conditions."},{"time":1004787,"text":"So many children who passed away 
are watching for us from heaven."},{"time":1012537,"text":"For those kids, I would like to 
make the Japanese medical front a place"},{"time":1016150,"text":"where I can be proud to say,
'Hey, it's a good hospital, isn't it?'"},{"time":1025065,"text":"(Applause)"}]}]}

speaker: Kashfia Rahman
title: How risk-taking changes a teenager's brain
text:
{"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"time":542,"text":"Have you ever tried
to understand a teenager?"},{"time":4875,"text":"It's exhausting, right?"},{"time":7000,"text":"You must be puzzled by the fact
that some teens do well in school,"},{"time":11542,"text":"lead clubs and teams"},{"time":13458,"text":"and volunteer in their communities,"},{"time":15833,"text":"but they eat Tide Pods
for an online challenge,"},{"time":19792,"text":"speed and text while driving,"},{"time":22250,"text":"binge drink and experiment
with illicit drugs."},{"time":26083,"text":"How can so many teens
be so smart, skilled and responsible --"},{"time":31500,"text":"and careless risk-takers at the same time?"}]},{"cues":[{"time":35125,"text":"When I was 16,"},{"time":36833,"text":"while frequently observing
my peers in person"},{"time":39542,"text":"as well as on social media,"},{"time":41708,"text":"I began to wonder why so many teens
took such crazy risks."},{"time":46583,"text":"It seems like getting a certificate
from DARE class in the fifth grade"},{"time":50458,"text":"can't stop them."}]},{"cues":[{"time":51792,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":52875,"text":"What was even more alarming to me"},{"time":54500,"text":"was that the more they exposed
themselves to these harmful risks,"},{"time":58250,"text":"the easier it became for them
to continue taking risks."},{"time":62542,"text":"Now this confused me,"},{"time":64583,"text":"but it also made me incredibly curious."},{"time":68083,"text":"So, as someone with a name"},{"time":69667,"text":"that literally means
"to explore knowledge,""},{"time":72625,"text":"I started searching
for a scientific explanation."}]},{"cues":[{"time":76458,"text":"Now, it's no secret
that teens ages 13 to 18"},{"time":79542,"text":"are more prone to risk-taking
than children or adults,"},{"time":83250,"text":"but what makes them so daring?"},{"time":86333,"text":"Do they suddenly become reckless,"},{"time":88333,"text":"or is this just a natural phase
that they're going through?"},{"time":91917,"text":"Well neuroscientists
have already found evidence"},{"time":94250,"text":"that the teen brain
is still in the process of maturation --"},{"time":97208,"text":"and that this makes them
exceptionally poor at decision-making,"},{"time":100708,"text":"causing them to fall prey
to risky behaviors."},{"time":104250,"text":"But in that case,
if the maturing brain is to blame,"},{"time":107708,"text":"then why are teens
more vulnerable than children,"},{"time":110417,"text":"even though their brains
are more developed than those of children?"},{"time":113625,"text":"Also, not all teens in the world
take risks at the same level."},{"time":117500,"text":"Are there some other underlying
or unintentional causes"},{"time":121000,"text":"driving them to risk-taking?"},{"time":123333,"text":"Well, this is exactly
what I decided to research."}]},{"cues":[{"time":127833,"text":"So, I founded my research
on the basis of a psychological process"},{"time":131583,"text":"known as "habituation,""},{"time":133542,"text":"or simply what we refer to
as "getting used to it.""},{"time":137417,"text":"Habituation explains how our brains
adapt to some behaviors,"},{"time":141167,"text":"like lying, with repeated exposures."},{"time":144500,"text":"And this concept inspired me
to design a project"},{"time":146792,"text":"to determine if the same principle"},{"time":149208,"text":"could be applied to the relentless
rise of risk-taking in teenagers."},{"time":154125,"text":"So I predicted that
habituation to risk-taking"},{"time":157458,"text":"may have the potential to change
the already-vulnerable teenage brain"},{"time":161417,"text":"by blunting or even eradicating"},{"time":163583,"text":"the negative emotions
associated with risk,"},{"time":166292,"text":"like fear or guilt."},{"time":168292,"text":"I also thought because they
would feel less fearful and guilty,"},{"time":171667,"text":"this desensitization would lead them
to even more risk-taking."},{"time":176000,"text":"In short, I wanted to conduct
a research study"},{"time":178375,"text":"to answer one big question:"},{"time":180958,"text":"Why do teens keep making
outrageous choices"},{"time":183583,"text":"that are harmful
to their health and well-being?"}]},{"cues":[{"time":187292,"text":"But there was one big obstacle in my way."},{"time":190083,"text":"To investigate this problem,"},{"time":192042,"text":"I needed teenagers to experiment on,"},{"time":194750,"text":"laboratories and devices
to measure their brain activity,"},{"time":198500,"text":"and teachers or professors to supervise me
and guide me along the way."},{"time":203083,"text":"I needed resources."},{"time":205417,"text":"But, you see, I attended
a high school in South Dakota"},{"time":208458,"text":"with limited opportunity
for scientific exploration."},{"time":212208,"text":"My school had athletics,"},{"time":214333,"text":"band, choir, debate and other clubs,"},{"time":218125,"text":"but there were no STEM programs
or research mentors."},{"time":221458,"text":"And the notion of high schoolers"},{"time":223083,"text":"doing research or participating
in a science fair was completely foreign."},{"time":228750,"text":"Simply put, I didn't exactly
have the ingredients"},{"time":231667,"text":"to make a chef-worthy dish."}]},{"cues":[{"time":235000,"text":"And these obstacles were frustrating,"},{"time":237208,"text":"but I was also a stubborn teenager."},{"time":240208,"text":"And as the daughter
of Bangladeshi immigrants"},{"time":242750,"text":"and one of just a handful
of Muslim students"},{"time":244875,"text":"in my high school in South Dakota,"},{"time":247083,"text":"I often struggled to fit in."},{"time":249333,"text":"And I wanted to be someone
with something to contribute to society,"},{"time":253792,"text":"not just be deemed
the scarf-wearing brown girl"},{"time":256583,"text":"who was an anomaly
in my homogenous hometown."},{"time":259708,"text":"I hoped that by doing this research,"},{"time":261458,"text":"I could establish this"},{"time":262917,"text":"and how valuable scientific exploration
could be for kids like me"},{"time":267333,"text":"who didn't necessarily
find their niche elsewhere."}]},{"cues":[{"time":270833,"text":"So with limited research opportunities,"},{"time":273375,"text":"inventiveness allowed me to overcome
seemingly impossible obstacles."},{"time":278542,"text":"I became more creative in working
with a variety of methodologies,"},{"time":282750,"text":"materials and subjects."},{"time":285333,"text":"I transformed my unassuming school library"},{"time":288500,"text":"into a laboratory"},{"time":290292,"text":"and my peers into lab rats."}]},{"cues":[{"time":292583,"text":"(Laughter)"}]},{"cues":[{"time":293792,"text":"My enthusiastic geography teacher,"},{"time":296583,"text":"who also happens to be
my school's football coach,"},{"time":299750,"text":"ended up as my cheerleader,"},{"time":301750,"text":"becoming my mentor
to sign necessary paperwork."},{"time":305333,"text":"And when it became logistically impossible"},{"time":307417,"text":"to use a laboratory
electroencephalography,"},{"time":310542,"text":"or EEG,"},{"time":311875,"text":"which are those electrode devices
used to measure emotional responses,"},{"time":316125,"text":"I bought a portable EEG headset
with my own money,"},{"time":319292,"text":"instead of buying the new iPhone X"},{"time":320958,"text":"that a lot of kids my age
were saving up for."}]},{"cues":[{"time":323917,"text":"So finally I started the research"},{"time":326458,"text":"with 86 students,
ages 13 to 18, from my high school."},{"time":330500,"text":"Using the computer cubicles
in my school library,"},{"time":333333,"text":"I had them complete a computerized
decision-making simulation"},{"time":336917,"text":"to measure their risk-taking behaviors
comparable to ones in the real world,"},{"time":341125,"text":"like alcohol use, drug use and gambling."},{"time":344917,"text":"Wearing the EEG headset,"},{"time":346750,"text":"the students completed the test
